org.apache.openjpa.meta
Interface XMLMetaData

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
XMLClassMetaData, XMLFieldMetaData
public interface XMLMetaData
extends Serializable

Describe metadata about an xml type.

Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Catalina Wei
